result.title: Final summary report on solar cell performance
result.description: The deliverable will summarize the electrical and optical characterizations performed on the nanowire multi-junction cells. Besides the calibration at standard testing conditions (STC, AM1.5g) also measurements under varying intensity and temperature will be performed. Additionally absorption and uniformity mapping results will be summarized

result.title: Asset Data dictionary
result.description: The asset data dictionary will take into account AM best practices among NIAs, including a set of guidelines to standardise the updating process of asset data and information. The asset data dictionary will contain: - a list of common asset items name related to road network infrastructure - asset data full description - asset data owner - key attributes related to assets items - a classification / grouping of asset data in macro categories.

result.title: Series of stakeholder engagement visits and Tech transfer visits
result.description: Series of stakeholder engagement visits and Tech transfer visits. Visits are planned in M12, 14, 16, 18, 20, 22, 24. A thorough understanding of activities being implemented in the project partners’ organisation as well as the living labs. National road authorities learn about implementation processes, and technical aspects in detail at the living lab.

result.title: Business Blue Print of an asset information management core system
result.description: A design of an IT solution for a common core system for asset management, including a set of guidelines for the deployment of an asset management information system.
